title: Aromatherapy & Perfumery Ingredients
description: View our vast range of of premium quality certified organic and conventional essential oils, CO2 extracts, hydrosols and specialty lipids that are ideal for the finest aromatherapy and natural fragrancing applications. In business for over 20 years, we offer exceptional quality, service and support.
cleaned_text: essential oils, attars and CO2 extracts to the cosmetic, aromatherapy, massage and spa industries. Our essential oils are 100% pure, and they are backed by GC analysis. Most of our oils are produced from plants grown in the wild and harvested with respect for the environment. Our selection of essential oils and supercritical carbon dioxide extracted oils (CO2s) continues to grow. We will be delighted to provide availability and pricing information for any oils not listed on our Web site. Please [contact us](/cs/contact_us.asp) for further information.
